original_text: They must be silenced, because they are disrupting whole households by teaching things they ought not to teach—and that for the sake of dishonest gain.
korean_text: 그들의 입을 막을 것이라 이런 자들이 더러운 이득을 취하려고 마땅하지 아니한 것을 가르쳐 가정들을 온통 무너뜨리는도다

sentences.original_text: because they are disrupting whole households
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 온 집안을 어지럽히고 있기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: by teaching things they ought not to teach
and that for the sake of dishonest gain
